rules_text: Draw a card unless an opponent pays 2 life.
special_text:
[+1]: You may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a type with it.
[-2]: Put target creature card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
[-8]: You control target player during their next turn. During that turn, that player may cast spells by paying life equal to their mana value rather than pay their mana cost. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn.
